name: Legends of Koyannis
description: Have you now heard it? You're not alone… you never were. That pile of flesh? That’s not the only thing following you… A great evil lies within these caves. Oh… Oh no… you poor poor soul… What will you do… when the time… is… up…?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD A8 7600 Quad Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7
